name: SoapUIProFunctionalTestingTask
description: A SmartBear task used to run SoapUI Pro tests
author: SmartBear Software

inputs.name: testRunnerPath
inputs.label: Path to TestRunner
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the fully-qualified name of the runner file (testrunner.bat). The latest installed ReadyAPI version will be used if testrunner.bat path has not been specified

inputs.name: project
inputs.label: Path to SoapUI Pro project
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the name of the project file.

inputs.name: testSuite
inputs.label: Test Suite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the test suite to run.

inputs.name: testCase
inputs.label: Test Case
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the test case to run.

inputs.name: environment
inputs.label: Environment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies the environment configuration for the test run.
